-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Random variate generation from hypergeometric distributions
--   
@package statistics-hypergeometric-genvar
@version 0.1.0.0


module Statistics.Distribution.Hypergeometric.GenVar

-- | Random variates from the hypergeometric distribution <i>(m, l, k)</i>.
--   Returns the number of white balls drawn when <i>k</i> balls are drawn
--   at random from an urn containing <i>m</i> white and <i>l-m</i> black
--   balls.
genVar :: (PrimMonad m, Integral a) => (a, a, a) -> Gen (PrimState m) -> m a
instance DiscreteGen HypergeometricDistribution
instance ContGen HypergeometricDistribution
